title: CHECK COMPONENTS ALIGNMENT SECLI, BUS AND ATLAS ONLY (TEST-ENV) AND SANITY CHECKS BEFORE MIGRATION

task_list.instruction_title:
_- Deploy Last **PRODUCTION **PATCH FOR ALL APPLICATION IN SCOPE OF RUN/DR
